uniandes.db

Class PhysicalMachineUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniandes.db.PhysicalMachineUpdater

  • public class PhysicalMachineUpdater
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to execute query, update and delete processes in database for Physical Machine Entity. Although this class execute query in virtualmachine execution entities

    CesarF

        public static boolean updatePhysicalMachine(java.lang.String host,
                            java.lang.String hostUser,
                            java.lang.String ip,
                            java.sql.Connection con)
        Updates a physical machine entity on database based in hostname
        Parameters:
        host - name in network for physical machine
        hostUser - user in physical machine
        ip - where message is coming
        con - Database Connection
        Returns:
        true in case physical machines could be updated, false in case not TODO: add validation of ip
